feed.title: Edward Zhou
feed.subtitle: A writeup of TryHackMe rooms, HackTheBox rooms and Capture the Flags using Jekyll with Chirpy-theme. Learning more about pentesting everyday.

entry.title: Game Zone
entry.summary: Click here if you’re interested in the room! This guide is meant to be used as a supplement for learning, please tackle this on your own before reading this! What is the name of the large cartoon avatar holding a sniper on the forum? When you’ve logged in, what page do you get redirected to? In the users table, what is the hashed password?
